content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ create a beautifully textured hat with the **wheat stitch™ crochet beanie** a bottom-up design that s stylish warm and easy to customize this pattern includes sizes from newborn to adult large making it a perfect choice for handmade gifts market prep or family sets ***bonus printable gift or market tags come with the paid pattern *** you ll start with a soft stretchy ribbed brim worked flat in row then join and transition seamlessly into *** my signature wheat stitch 1 *** for the body of the hat for extra impact switch colors every two rounds to create eye-catching stripes or keep it classic with a solid color simple decreases shape the crown and the beanie is topped with a playful pompom and optional tag for that personal maker s touch whether you re making your first hat or adding a new textured design to your shop lineup the wheat stitch beanie is a modern classic you ll come back to again and again a video tutorial 2 is included in the pattern **crochet hooks ** g 4 0mm & h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 **yarn ** soho playful 7 contrast color cc 65% acrylic/35% cotton 218yds/100g + herrschners supreme 8 main color mc 100% acrylic 169yds/100g colorway shown porcelain **yarn quantities ** 105 115 165 185 225 255 270 280 yds with fold-up brim 1 ball of each cc & mc cc 70 70 110 120 150 155 160 160 yds mc 35 45 55 65 75 100 110 120 yds **yarn substitutions ** malabrigo rios 9 - 100% superwash merino wool 210yds/100g brava worsted 10 - 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch 11 - 80% acrylic/20% superwash wool 208yds/100g heatherly worsted 12 - 80% acrylic/20% merino wool 328yds/100g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain flo - front loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet two together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** 15 sts and 15 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat see gauge swatch instructions not blocked 16 row = 4 inches for ribbing not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 **sizes ** newborn baby toddler child teen adult small medium large to fit head circumference 12-14 14-16 16-18 18-20 20-22 21-22 22-23 23-24 **skill level ** advanced beginner **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to
